PageTitle: display mpls bfd session protocol mldp p2mp
FuncDef: The display mpls bfd session protocol mldp p2mp command displays information about a BFD session that monitors an mLDP P2MP tunnel.
CLIs: display mpls bfd session protocol mldp p2mp [ root-ip <root-ip> { lsp-id <lsp-id> | opaque-value <opaque-value> } ] [ bfd-type ldp-tunnel ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about a BFD session that monitors an mLDP P2MP LSP that originates from a specified root node.
-

Displays information about a BFD session that monitors an mLDP P2MP LSP with a specified P2MP LSP ID.
-

Displays information about a BFD session that monitors an mLDP P2MP LSP with a specified opaque value.
-

Specifies the type of BFD session.
-

Displays information about BFD sessions that monitor mLDP tunnels.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls bfd session protocol mldp p2mp
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about a BFD session that monitors an mLDP P2MP tunnel, run the display mpls bfd session protocol mldp p2mp command. The command output contains the LSP ID, the discriminator of the BFD session, and the BFD session status.
